alert.note: Alert for Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:55PM CDT until September 16 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CAMERON COUNTY... At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lozano, or near Laureles, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rio Hondo, Laureles, Miller Jordan Middle School, Palmer Laasko Elementary, Lozano, Lopez - Riggins Elementary School, Los Fresnos High School, Los Fresnos City Offices, and Library Memorial Middle School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
